snippet: Buddhist mobs killed a 94-year-old Muslim woman and burned more than 70 homes on Tuesday as sectarian violence again gripped Rakhine State.
abstract: Buddhist mobs kill 94-year-old Muslim woman and burn more than 70 homes in Rakhine State, Myanmar; sectarian violence once again grips region despite visit by President Thein Sein aimed at resolving tensions.
lead_paragraph: Buddhist mobs killed a 94-year-old Muslim woman and burned more than 70 homes on Tuesday as sectarian violence again gripped Rakhine State.
